name: The Path to Greatness: Becoming the GOAT
name_original: The Path to Greatness: Becoming the GOAT
description:
Click through this interactive story where you choose your own destiny to become the Greatest of All Time, the GOAT. 

You will encounter twists and turns while you play your sport and live out your life while becoming a professional athlete, or at least trying to become one. 

What will you decide?
